name: Kappa
tagline: Home to the Kappa Android Kernel
body:
Home to the Kappa Android Kernel Based on official sources by Sony (4.1.B.1.13) 
Modded with Governors taken from @DoomLord 
SIO Scheduler by Miguel Boton 

For selection of Governors or IO scheduler make menuconfig to be used. 

This kernel is a work in progress. I hereby decline any responsability if you compile it, flash and then find yourself with an expensive paperweight!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
